articles.title: ‘The Odyssey’ 70MM Imax Tickets Selling Out For Regal & AMC, But Seats Still Available - Deadline
articles.description: Universal and Imax‘s grand experiment to put 70MM tickets on sale a year in advance for Christopher Nolan’s The Odyssey is going quite well. Tickets for Regal’s 70MM Imax showtimes of the pic sold out in under 12 hours per the circuit, “a rare feat that speak…
articles.content:

articles.author: Bob Thomas, The Associated Press
articles.title: 'My personal life is a regret from A to Z': Connie Francis, whose roofing contractor, accordion-playing father was just her first obstacle, dies at 87 - Fortune
articles.description: The pop star was married four times and would say that only her third husband, Joseph Garzilli, was worth the trouble. The other marriages each lasted less than a year.
articles.content: Connie Francis, the wholesome pop star of the 1950s and 1960s whose hits include Pretty Little Baby and who would later serve as an ironic title for a personal life filled with heartbreak and tragedy… [+3871 chars]
